name: ClearIt5
description:
Clear each of these cleverly designed levels! Each board contains a colorful puzzle that increases in complexity as you advance. Shoot balls from the edges of the field to hit and clear balls in the center. Position like colors together to make them disappear. The rules are simple, but each puzzle brings new surprises and challenges.

190 clever puzzles to master
Vibrant colors and smooth animations
10 hours of puzzling fun
